about.title: About Me
about.description_1: Hello! I'm Welder, a Front-end Developer with a Technical Degree in Computer Science from IFRR and about 3 years of experience, passionate about creating dynamic and efficient interfaces.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Explore the projects I've worked on. Click the cards for detailed insights into each exciting project.

instagram_app.title: Instagram App
instagram_app.description: An Instagram-themed app with theme switching (light/dark) and integration with a photo API.

burger_app.title: Burger App
burger_app.description: An app for ordering burgers with transitions between screens and the ability to manage orders.

weather_forecast.title: Weather Forecast
weather_forecast.description: This site fetches weather data for any city, showing current conditions and a 5-day forecast.

login_fotografia.title: Photography Login
login_fotografia.description: A themed login page created for a job application, which helped me land my first role.

login_dark.title: Dark Theme Login
login_dark.description: A clean, elegant login screen built with HTML and CSS.

landing_halloween.title: Halloween Landing Page
landing_halloween.description: A fun project to practice animations and responsive design.

login_black_white.title: Black and White Login Page
login_black_white.description: A simple login page featuring smooth transition animations.

landing_padaria.title: Bakery Landing Page
landing_padaria.description: A site designed to refine my styling skills, with an email sending API implementation.

senaigame.title: Senai Game Activity
senaigame.description: A project developed during a Senai course, focusing on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills.

barbearia.title: Barbershop Landing Page
barbearia.description: A landing page for a barbershop, created to enhance my design and layout skills.
